short_summary: A temporary help services requirement for Department of National Defense.
description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for temporary help services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Computer Application Support Services
## Government of Canada - Department of National Defense
#### Tender Reference Number: S4899643

###Classification Information###


* UNSPSC Code: 80111600 (Temporary Personnel Services)
* Trade Agreements: CPTPP, CFTA

###Tender Description###

The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, specifically for Computer Application Support. This tender is open only to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the streams and categories listed below:

* Stream 5.1: Computer Application Support

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
* BRYCA Solutions Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Conoscenti Technologies Inc.
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* InfoMedia Systems Group, Inc.
* IT/Net - Ottawa Inc.
* Labor Tek Personnel Services Ltd / Labor Tek Services de Personnel Ltee
* Maverin Inc.
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* Norconex Inc.
* Pennant Canada Limited
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP./SOCIÉTÉ TEKSYSTEMS CANADA
* Zernam Enterprise Inc.

###Requirements and Evaluation Criteria###

* The successful supplier will provide Temporary Help Services for Computer Application Support.
* The evaluation criteria will be based on the lowest price.

###Security Requirement###

* The minimum security level required for this tender is Reliability.

### Tender Documents and Information ###

* Tender Notice URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34610/s4899643---method-2-rfp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34610/s4899643---method-2-rfp_0.pdf)
* Contact Information:
	+ CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
	+ Phone: 613-971-795
	+ Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)

###Tender Closing Date and Time###


The tender closing date is March 28, 2024, at 15:00:00.
The tender has expired.
